summary.para: Uploads coverage reports to Codecov. Note that, many CI services (like AppVeyor) do not require you to provide a Codecov upload token. However, TeamCity is a rare exception.

In order to use the commands for this addin, you will need to include the following in your cake script:
#tool nuget:?package=Codecov
#addin nuget:?package=Cake.Codecov

member.name: M:Cake.Codecov.CodecovAliases.Codecov(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Codecov.CodecovSettings)
member.summary: Uploads coverage reports to Codecov using the given settings.

member.name: M:Cake.Codecov.CodecovAliases.Codecov(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.String)
member.summary: Uploads coverage reports to Codecov by specifying the report files and Codecov token.

member.name: M:Cake.Codecov.CodecovAliases.Codecov(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Uploads coverage reports to Codecov by specifying the report files. Note that, many CI services (like AppVeyor) do not require you to provide a Codecov upload token. However, TeamCity is a rare exception.

member.name: M:Cake.Codecov.CodecovAliases.Codecov(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Uploads coverage report to Codecov by specifying the report file and Codecov token.

member.name: M:Cake.Codecov.CodecovAliases.Codecov(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String)
member.summary: Uploads coverage report to Codecov by specifying the report file. Note that, many CI services (like AppVeyor) do not require you to provide a Codecov upload token. However, TeamCity is a rare exception.

member.name: T:Cake.Codecov.CodecovSettings
member.summary:
Contains settings used by . See CommandLineOptions or run
.\codecov.exe --help
for more details.

member.name: P:Cake.Codecov.CodecovSettings.Branch
member.summary: Gets or sets a property specifing the branch name.
member.value: A property specifing the branch name.

member.name: P:Cake.Codecov.CodecovSettings.Build
member.summary: Gets or sets a property specifing the build number.
member.value: A property specifing the build number.

member.name: P:Cake.Codecov.CodecovSettings.Commit
member.summary: Gets or sets a property specifing the commit sha.
member.value: A property specifing the commit sha.

member.name: P:Cake.Codecov.CodecovSettings.DisableNetwork
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to toggle functionalities. (1) --disable-network. Disable uploading the file network.
member.value: A value indicating whether to toggle functionalities. (1) --disable-network. Disable uploading the file network.

member.name: P:Cake.Codecov.CodecovSettings.Dump
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to don't upload and dump to stdin.
member.value: A value indicating whether to don't upload and dump to stdin.

member.name: P:Cake.Codecov.CodecovSettings.Envs
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifing the enviornment variables to be included with this build. (1) CODECOV_ENV=VAR1,VAR2. (2) -e VAR1 VAR2.
member.value: A value specifing the enviornment variables to be included with this build. (1) CODECOV_ENV=VAR1,VAR2. (2) -e VAR1 VAR2.

member.name: P:Cake.Codecov.CodecovSettings.Files
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifing the target file(s) to upload. (1) -f 'path/to/file'. Only upload this file. (2) -f 'path/to/file1 path/to/file2'. Only upload these files.
member.value: A value specifing the target file(s) to upload. (1) -f 'path/to/file'. Only upload this file. (2) -f 'path/to/file1 path/to/file2'. Only upload these files.

member.name: P:Cake.Codecov.CodecovSettings.Flags
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifing the flag the upload to group coverage metrics. (1) --flag unittests. This upload is only unittests. (2) --flag integration. This upload is only integration tests. (3) --flag ut,chrome. This upload is chrome - UI tests.
member.value: A value specifing the flag the upload to group coverage metrics. (1) --flag unittests. This upload is only unittests. (2) --flag integration. This upload is only integration tests. (3) --flag ut,chrome. This upload is chrome - UI tests.

member.name: P:Cake.Codecov.CodecovSettings.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifing the custom defined name of the upload. Visible in Codecov UI.
member.value: A value specifing the custom defined name of the upload. Visible in Codecov UI.

member.name: P:Cake.Codecov.CodecovSettings.NoColor
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to remove color from the output.
member.value: A value indicating whether to remove color from the output.

member.name: P:Cake.Codecov.CodecovSettings.Pr
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifing the pull request number.
member.value: A value specifing the pull request number.

member.name: P:Cake.Codecov.CodecovSettings.Required
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to exit with 1 if not successful. Default will Exit with 0.
member.value: A value indicating whether to exit with 1 if not successful. Default will Exit with 0.

member.name: P:Cake.Codecov.CodecovSettings.Root
member.summary: Gets or sets a value used when not in git project to identify project root directory.
member.value: A value used when not in git project to identify project root directory.

member.name: P:Cake.Codecov.CodecovSettings.Slug
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifing the owner/repo slug used instead of the private repo token in Enterprise. (option) Set environment variable CODECOV_SLUG=:owner/:repo.
member.value: A value specifing the owner/repo slug used instead of the private repo token in Enterprise. (option) Set environment variable CODECOV_SLUG=:owner/:repo.

member.name: P:Cake.Codecov.CodecovSettings.Tag
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifing the git tag.
member.value: A value specifing the git tag.

member.name: P:Cake.Codecov.CodecovSettings.Token
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifing the private repository token. (option) set the enviornment variable CODECOV_TOKEN-uuid. (1) -t @/path/to/token_file. (2) -t uuid.
member.value: A value specifing the private repository token. (option) set the enviornment variable CODECOV_TOKEN-uuid. (1) -t @/path/to/token_file. (2) -t uuid.

member.name: P:Cake.Codecov.CodecovSettings.Url
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifing the target url for Enterprise customers. (option) Set environment variable CODECOV_URL=https://my-hosted-codecov.com.
member.value: A value specifing the target url for Enterprise customers. (option) Set environment variable CODECOV_URL=https://my-hosted-codecov.com.

member.name: P:Cake.Codecov.CodecovSettings.Verbose
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to run in verbose mode.
member.value: A value indicating whether to run in verbose mode.
